title: *BUG* "BLUE ESSENCE" FROM "RUNES'" ARE NOT COMING THROUGH
body:
I have completed the "rune mission" and was meant to receive 20000 + 7000 Blue essence but it has bugged and not come through. I want to purchase items for the blue essence sale but I will not be able to if I haven't received the BE from runes. 
I am on OCE servers btw.

Thanks,

Its a player

replies.body:
Hey guys, the OK, COOL essence notification is **NOT **all of your blue essence!  Many rewards are now mission based, which is a big change from when we used to take months to hand out rewards to everyone.

**Check your missions**, you will see everything ranging from Blue Essence conversion to rune page skins, and veteran rewards. It can quickly be done on an AI vs Coop game if you need this quickly.

Once the mission is complete, you will find capsules in your **Hextech Crafting loot **to obtain your essence.
I understand what to do but i dont get the mission for it

I wonder why this process has to be that complicated... Facing the challenge to set and learn the new rune system is one thing then this? I wonder if you guys were overthinking too much on this one. As a user, I can't really see the benefit of designing this transition complicated more than necessary (unless your business logic won over usability), yet thanks for the clarification. Pre-season finally has begun!

This is really good feedback for our devs!  When you have time, go over in detail the complications you're feeling and any suggestions to make it better over at our [gameplay boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)  My perception is that having it mission based makes it a lot simpler for everyone to get their rewards in a timely manner.  In the past we would run scripts that could cause delays due to so many eligible players or issues if something/someone was missed.
Did you go into your loot and open the capsules the mission gave you yet? Might have missed that little step, so double check your loot first and let me know.
